name: Telechronic Static
description:
Meet Vatiel

This young man has gone through many events in his life.

It is your job to decide these events and save him from harming himself.

This may take a few tries, so good luck. You may get the same ending multiple times.

Telechronic Static is an experimental visual novel that I created in the span of six months in 2017, to test out imagemaps, yet was never meant to be released (until now) due to the heavy amount of bad endings/triggering content within the game.

The goal of the game?

Keep Vatiel alive.

Do not play this game if you are sensitive to heavy topics such as death and depression. You have been warned!

Story/Writer: Rinzamakani

GUI design: Rinzamakani

Music: Kai Engel

Sprite art/CG art: Cherry Stx
